description:
Mikan’s and Rito’s parents are never home, so the approaching Christmas holiday does not excite them. Lala helps fulfill a wish of Mikan’s. Rito is accidentally transported into Peke’s body, and chaos ensues during gym class. Rito pretends to be Ren’s boyfriend as a favor, but they aren’t fooling anyone.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: For Whom the Bell Tolls / The Troubling Rampage / Loving Idol
Pour qui sonne le glas / Le fauteur de troubles ? / L`idol amoureuse
Ta ga Tame ni Beru wa Naru / Meiwaku Bousou? / Loving Idol
誰がためにベルは鳴る / 迷惑暴走? / 恋心アイドル
